name: Group In3Sight Service System
short_description: 1901 Group is a fast-growing, privately-held information management company focused on IT performance efficiency.
long_description:
1901 Group is a fast-growing, privately-held information management company
focused on IT performance efficiency. We leverage continuous monitoring from a
secure operations facility in Blacksburg, Va. on Virginia Tech_ s Corporate
Research Center campus. Our business model provides our personnel with exciting
technology and business career opportunities that balance high levels of
productivity with a high quality of life. Our clients include enterprise
organizations from the financial, higher education, commercial, U.S. federal,
and U.S. state government markets geographically ranging from Arizona to New
Jersey. 1901 Group is seeking highly motivated individuals in the fields of
information technology as well as business intelligence and sales to join our
quickly expanding and passionate team! Connect with us!
